reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Acrylic Steamer Remover Portable Harmless Nail Machine Nail Art Tools BLUETOP (Electric,White) BLUETOP {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 7.5 x 7.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds'} Works on acrylic nails without pealing off the top layer of nail or hurting my hands. I have only used once because I only remove my nails once a month or longer if I can, but it was much. Better than soaking or using foil or gloves. Both hands took me about 3 hours so I purchased a 2nd one so I could do each hand at the same time and I think I got the hang of getting the Acrylic off better towards the end so I hope to cut the time down to less than a hour next time.

It also came quickly Better than soaking Sofi Art Instant Soft Gel Nail Tips - Sculpted Almond Medium - 504 pcs 11 sizes SOFI-ART {'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'SOFI-ART', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'UPC': '689354978250'} I have used on myself and mom. They are not that sculpted but nice. Thinner than the gelx but still nice. Nice nails. Sofi Art Instant Soft Gel Nail Tips - Stiletto Natural Medium - 504 pcs 10 sizes SOFI-ART {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'SOFI-ART', 'Style': 'Stiletto', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'UPC': '689354978281'} Not my favorites but they are nice gel full cover tips. Nice Yokilly 120pcs French Nail Long Press on False Acrylic Nails Ballerina Glossy Full Cover Fake Nail Tips with Nail Stickers,Files and Stick (D) Yokilly {'Size': '120 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Yokilly', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 2.56 x 0.71 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '190431067793'} Very pretty and nice Nice 3D Mix CHANGAR {'Brand': 'CHANGAR', 'Cartoon Character': 'Bubble', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 4.1 x 0.85 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '030391583141'} I thought it would be like foils but it is not. You really need to know how to encapsulate in acrylic You have to be able to use acrylic to make work Nail Art Foil Transfer Stickers Buffalo Plaid Design Classic Christmas Nail Foil Adhesive Decals, Christmas Decals Foil Stickers Set Nail Tips Manicure Women and Girls Nail Art DIY (Buffalo Plaid) BiBiSi {'Surface Recommendation Plastic': '', '': 'Unit Count 10.00 Count', 'Installation Type Self-Adhesive': '', 'Brand': 'BiBiSi', 'Color': 'Colorful', 'Theme': 'Christmas', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Plaid', 'Package Dimensions': '5.25 x 4 x 1.25 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Love it Love it Outyua 100Pcs Extra Long Fake Nails Coffin Pink Glossy Press on Nail Acrylic Ballerina Artificial False Nails Arts for Women and Grils (Pink) Outyua ['How to use 1.Remove the surface keratin by gently grinding the nails slices with a scrub,rinse and keep the nails clean and dry. 2.Select the right size of the nails and take the right amount of adhesive tape on the inside of the selected nail plate. 3.Attach a slice from the root of the nail to the front of the nail,hold down the nail for 8 seconds,stick it tightly', 'How to unload Adhesive tape of adhesive tape:Nail polish remover is not necessary,use dead skin to remove the nail from both sides of the nail.', 'Considerations 1:Avoid pasting in places such as inflammation and redness. 2:Dot not place in the reach of the children. 3:To protect the nails,do not force the removal of the nail.', "Remark： 1：Full nails design,High Quality ABS Material,Practical length, make your nails slim and have a very realistic or at least a professionally done appearance.These nails will last for at least 1-2 weeks with normal care,will be longer when using quality glue. 2：Please remove the fake nails when you bath, wash clothes, wash dishes, etc. when you touch the water for a long time, otherwise the viscosity of the nail jelly will decrease. To prevent this problem, you can use your own glue to extend the use of\xa0false nails 3：Natural false nails will Make your nails more attractive.No matter what your nail size is, you can choose the most suitable false nail for yourself ,Just a few minutes, it is easy to trim and file them to in any length and shape you like.It's suitable for most occasion."] {'Color': 'Pink', 'Size': '100 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Outyua', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.62 x 0.83 inches; 1.62 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'NS-094', 'UPC': '193305828605', 'Manufacturer': 'Outyua'} I apparently thought there was 1000 in the package because I would have never paid that much for just 100 nails but they are ok nails. too high priced Pro1-9 Sizes V Shaped Rainbow French Manicure Guides Cutter Nail Art Tool Kit Pink White Nail Gel Tips Stencil, HJ-NAT187-FC01 Honey Joy {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '630808120183'} I thought I was getting 2. I thought I could use as a painting template and really not. I think it is for acrylic. Can not use.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferences:**
  - **Nail Care:** The user maintains a strong interest in efficient tools for acrylic nails and gel products, now expanding to include decorative elements and extra-long artificial nails. 
  - **Technique:** Prefers innovative methods for efficiency, integrating creative designs into monthly manicures. Recent experiences with certain products have raised concerns about their practicality and value.
  - **Frequency:** Uses products infrequently, prioritizing quality and effectiveness while seeking seasonal and thematic designs.

- **Product Experience:**
  - **Multiple Use:** Continues to invest in tools and decorative items aimed at enhancing efficiency. Recent purchases indicate mixed feelings regarding value for money, particularly with stencils and templates that do not meet expectations.
  - **Learning Curve:** Committed to mastering new techniques, though increasingly cautious about the value of products, especially non-decorative items.
  - **Positive Evaluation:** Typically provides high ratings for several products but has faced mixed experiences lately that affect overall sentiment and perceived value.

- **Rating Behavior:**
  - **Balanced Evaluation:** Offers honest feedback with an average rating of 3.1. Recent disappointments regarding certain products’ pricing are now evidenced by lower ratings, tempered by satisfaction in decorative items.

- **Delivery Expectations:**
  - **Timeliness:** Values prompt delivery and responsive customer service, ensuring timely use of products for special occasions.

**Trends:**
- **Innovation Seeking:** Actively pursues modern solutions while integrating creative elements in nail care, yet remains vigilant about product value.
